text: Aunou-le-Faucon is a Commune of the Orne department in north-western France. There are 273 people living there. There is a church called Eglise St-Cyr-et- Ste-Julitte. The steeple dates from the 17th century. There is a fortified house dated from the 15th century, this is the "Tour aux Anglais". There are many horse farms around. Category:Communes in Orne
title: Aunou-le-Faucon
